item.title: Making Sounds play with Animation at the Same Time
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

I have added sounds to my own client / server ( RuneJava 3.0 )
So, heres what i have put for the burrying bones

      actionTimer = 2;
	  frame174(380,000,035);
      startAnimation(0x33B);
      deleteItem(prayer[4], prayer[5], playerItemsN[prayer[5]]);

So i go onto my client, and bury trhe bones. The animation geos first, andthen after you stand up, the sound plays. Is there a way i can fix this?

Read full topic
item.source: Making Sounds play with Animation at the Same Time
